Package controller

package controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AccountControl
    The AccountControl class handles all of the logic behind the carious Account GUI operations throughout the system
    BrowseControl
    BrowseControl handles all of the logic behind the different GUI operations when in the Browse section of the system
    CartControl
    CartControl handles all of the logic behind the various GUI components associated with the Cart process of the system
    ErrorWriter
    ErrorWriter class, creates a class that Formats any exceptions and writes them to a file
    GrowingMains
    Driver for GrowingPains application
    OrderControl
    OrderControl handles the GUI operations for selecting and cancelling an order from the Customers existing orders
    PasswordHasher
    PasswordHasher is used throughout the system when the customer alters or creates a new Password.
    PaymentControl
    PaymentControl handles all of the logic behind the Order creation process
